org.apache.beam.runners.flink.translation

Class FlinkStreamingTranslationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.runners.flink.translation.FlinkStreamingTranslationContext

  • public class FlinkStreamingTranslationContext
extends Object
    Helper for keeping track of which DataStreams map to which PTransforms.
